name: Muramana
passive: Awe: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 2% maximum Mana. Shock: Basic attacks and single target abilities against champions consume 3% current Mana to deal bonus physical damage.
description: Item that provides Attack Damage, Ability Haste, Ability Haste. Passive effect: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 2% maximum Mana. Shock: Basic attacks and single target abilities against champions consume 3% current Mana to deal bonus physical damage.. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: Great for champions who want to maximize their damage output
Synergizes well with other damage items for burst potential
Consider building this when ahead to snowball your advantage
Perfect for champions with high mana consumption
Helps sustain your presence in lane without frequent recalls
